parameter.name: config_1
parameter.label: 1: Basic Set Level
parameter.description:
Set basic set value to be on or off.
0=Disable
1-99=Use Value

parameter.name: config_2
parameter.label: 2: Temperature Trigger ON value
parameter.description: Temperature level when a ON command is sent out. Set to 99 to disable.

parameter.name: config_3
parameter.label: 3: Temperature Trigger OFF value
parameter.description: Temperature level when a OFF command is sent out. Set to 99 to disable.

parameter.name: config_4
parameter.label: 4: Humidity Trigger ON value
parameter.description:
Humidity level when a ON command is sent out. Set to 99 to disable.
Interval in seconds.

parameter.name: config_5
parameter.label: 5: Humidity Trigger OFF value
parameter.description:
Humidity level when a OFF command is sent out. Set to 99 to disable.
Interval in seconds.

parameter.name: config_6
parameter.label: 6: Auto report time
parameter.description:
Sets the time interval when a sensor report is sent.
0 = Disable
1 min - 1439 min = Auto report periodically

parameter.name: config_7
parameter.label: 7: Auto report temperature
parameter.description:
Sets the temperature change causing a sensor report.
0 = Disable
1 - 70 = Auto report on temperature change

parameter.name: config_8
parameter.label: 8: Auto report humidity
parameter.description:
Sets the humidity change causing a sensor report.
0 = Disable
5 - 70 = Auto report on humidity change
